The Shire Chamber of Commerce

The Shire Chamber of Commerce Target Audience Color Scheme Typography

Target Audience

The Shire is full of hobbits young and old who can make use of the Chamber of Commerce.

Bilbo Bogwash


A young Hobbit, only 19 years old, who is anxious to start a business. His pasttime is spent smoking, eating and selling pies. He is friends to young and old in The Shire. He likes to read, most of of his reading is done online. He is a fruit stand serving the finest fruit and fruit pies in all of middle earth. Bilbo does most of his marketing online, and wants to join the Chamber of Commerce for its valuable backlink that will strengthen his SEO.

Rosy Undertree


Is a busy young mother of 3 little hobbits. 32 years of age. Purchase mainly food for her family and household items. Her favorite time of the day is laying in her hammock while her little Hobbits are napping, if they ever nap at the same time which is never. Rosy is short on time and money. Every dollar and moment counts. She likes to read the reviews that are populated on the page to get the best information about business. Hobbits like herself rate and comment on various businesses.

Other Scenarios

1)Established businesses in The Shire would advertise the site to help promote their local business.

2) The Shire Chamber of Commerce would also advertise their site on other established Middle Earth websites, such as other Chamber of Commerce to help strengthen the SEO of our site and draw more business to The Shire.

3) Business owners could advertise their businesses on The Shire. This would help build their reputation.

4) If the business has a good standing with the Chamber of Commerce, we could advertise that they have been a member for a specific length of time.

5) Frugal consumers that live in or near The Shire can view the website, to read online reviews of their local businesses.
